title.rendered: STEDI MOTORCYCLE H4 LED HEADLIGHT UPGRADE KIT

content.rendered:
Night Pilot LED Headlight Conversion Kit H4 Replacement for factory Motorcycle Halogen bulb. H4 Motorbike Globe

SHARPER BEAM FURTHER LIGHT PENETRATION

EXCELLENT HEADLIGHT UPGRADE

DETAILS

We know all too well just how poorly the factory H4 headlight perform on your motorcycle. Your primary headlights are the single most important light source for night driving and your first and last line of defence to avoid any potential road hazaards.

This is why in our search for the ultimate LED headlight conversion system our criteria was first and foremost long term quality and reliability. We sampled, age and field tested over 20 different conversion kits from every end of the spectrum claims to quality, lumens, to finally settle on 3rd GEN MC kit.. The motorcycle H4 kit has a specifically optimised focal length design for motorbike reflector housings.

KEY TECHNICAL BREAK DOWN

  • THERMAL MANAGEMENT – Quite literally the end all be all of all LED Lighting is thermal management. The inferior LED conversion kits use inexpensive non application specific fans which are prone to failure. 11 out of 20 we aged tested failed within 45 days. When the fan fails, the LED will fail shortly thereafter. The hollow 6063 Aluminium uses a specially designed Convection style heat sink that stays cooler on one side than the other so it can pull the hot air out of the heat sink.
  • LIGHT OUTPUT –Needless to say our foremost criteria in light output demanded excellent in lux performance and excellent net light volume, but just as equally important was that the beam must be precisely mimics the original halogen bulb. In order to meet this demand, countless hours of optic ray tracing tests were performed to ensure a universally coherent focal sweet spot is achieved.  Powered by Philips – Lumileds Luxeon ground breaking ZE S, pushes out real 1,760Lm. We are so confident that our Motorbike Night Pilots will exceed your expectation, we are offering a 30 day money back guarantee, and a real 24 month replacement warranty.

TECHNOLOGY 

  • CAN-Bus error FREE Module
  • Electrically Protected again RF and EM Interference
  • Over and Under Voltage Protection
  • Waterproof connectors
  • Plug and Play H4 Connector | No cutting or professional installation required, just plug and play
  • Ingress Protection IP67
  • 5700Kelvin
  • Removable Collar for easy install

SPECIFICATIONS

HOUSING MATERIAL 6063 Aviation Aluminium
LED CHIP TYPE 12 x Philip™ ZES (Each Lamp)
POWER 2.1A each @ 13.6v
RAW LUMENS 3,450Lm each globe (RAW)

1,760Lm each globe (Actual)
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE DC 12v and 24v
LIFESPAN 30,000 hours
CANBUS Built in.
SOCKET TYPE H4
INGRESS PROTECTION IP65
OPERATING TEMP -40°c to + 80°c

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x H4 Motorcycle STEDI Night Pilot LED Conversion Headlight
  • 1 x Drivers
  • Mounting Hardware
  • Intsallation Guide

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
